name: Space Criminals
description:
A CO-OP game set in a space prison. 4 criminals are attempting to flee the prison in groups of 2 and during the escape they must get past security questions in form of trivia questions.

Also there is the possibility for sabotage.

Can you escape the space prison?

Available at the Steam Workshop

Credits  and some words

Card templates: https://www.fairway3games.com/free-poker-sized-card-templates/

Table model:https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1968457527

A thank you for trying this out, this game has been a part of my school's final project before our graduation. So thank you for playing Space Criminals!

And thank you my classmate Rasmus for helping out with some things!
